titles.title: Breathe On Me Breath Of God (easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Breathe on me breath of God Fill me with life anew That I may love the things You love And do what You would do{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Breathe on me breath of God Until my heart is pure Until with You I will one will To do and to endure{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Breathe on me breath of God Till I am one with You Your fire of love shall glow in me My earthbound soul renew{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Breathe on me breath of God So shall I never die But live with You the perfect life For all eternity{/lang-eng}
